original: Lindvall, Erik, direktör, Göteborg, f. 22/11/77 i St. Tuna, Kopparb. 1., av fanj. Erik L. o. Christina Hersén. G. 12 m. Ew^ie Hesselgren. Barn: Nils-Erik f. 13, ing. o. driftsled. v. A-B Gimnilse Tegel, Tore 16, disp. v. Falkenbergs Tegelbruks A-B o. Falkenbergs Kodimport, A^[ärta 17, g. m. ark. Leo Uulas, Sthlm, Margareta 19 g. m. disp. Nils Schütt, Falkenberg, Elsa 26, stud., Gbg. — Disp. v. Falkenbergs’ Tegelbruks A-B 06, verks t. dir. där 19-44, verkst. dir. i Falkenbergs Järnv. A-B 34-37 o. i firma Falkenbergs Kolimport sed. 17, verkst. dir. i A-B Gun-nilse Tegel i Gunnilse sed. 37, i Bygg-n :varor Lindvall & Co. i Gbg sed. 44. Led. av stadsfullm. i Falkenb. 18-36, led. av drätselkamm. 15-35, ordf. 22-35, led. av byggn :nd o. beredn :utsk. RVO 37.
translated: Lindvall, Erik, director, Gothenburg, b. 22/11/77 in St. Tuna, Kopparberg County, 1st child of sergeant Erik L. and Christina Hersén. Married to Ewie Hesselgren in 12. Children: Nils-Erik b. 13, engineer and operations manager at A-B Gimnilse Tegel; Tore b. 16, dispatcher at Falkenbergs Tegelbruks A-B and Falkenbergs Kodimport; Ärta b. 17, married to architect Leo Uulas in Stockholm; Margareta b. 19, married to dispatcher Nils Schütt in Falkenberg; Elsa b. 26, student, Gothenburg. Worked as a dispatcher at Falkenbergs’ Tegelbruks A-B in 06, served as the executive director from 19-44; executive director at Falkenbergs Järnv. A-B from 34-37 and in the company Falkenbergs Kolimport since 17; executive director at A-B Gunnelse Tegel in Gunnelse since 37, and in the construction goods company Lindvall & Co. in Gothenburg since 44. Member of the city council in Falkenberg from 18-36, member of the fiscal committee from 15-35, chairman from 22-35, member of the construction board and the planning committee. Awarded the Royal Order of Vasa in 37.
